review: It was pleasant experience.  DR KALARA is thorough professional. She is good nature, friendly Dr who knows her job..I wish her all the best.

review:
I visited Dr Shilpa for getting my teeth fixed. It took me 5-6 visits and now I am very much satisfied with my new teeth. She extracted few teeth painlessly, then she called me for few more steps for taking measurement of my teeth. I am wearing a denture in my upper teeth and fixed teeth in lower teeth. I am able to chew properly now finally and also happy with my appearance now.
Thank you doctor and God bless
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback Sir! We tried to conservatively manage your case by giving complete denture in the upper arch and saved your lower teeth by giving FPDs in the lower arch and finally managed to get a rehabilitated new dentition. Thank you for trusting us and giving time for providing you with the quality dental treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
I went to Dr Shilpa for dentures.. she explained all the possible options for removable dentures and I am very happy to say that she suggested Flexible dentures to me. I am finding Flexible dentures very comfortable to wear and they look like my natural teeth.
Thank you doctor.
reply_text:
Flexible dentures are specially fabricated for patients like you who have problems with their conventional dentures like being too rigid, cause of bad breath and not adapting well to the tissues. All these concerns are usually resolved with the new flexible dentures. 
Thank you for believing in us!
